brief: Create an MVP for a B2B SaaS startup that provides AI-powered customer service automation. The platform should include a chat interface, knowledge base integration, and basic analytics dashboard. Target launch in 3 months with a team of 5 developers.

project_overview.title: AI Customer Service MVP
project_overview.description: Development of a minimum viable product for an AI-powered customer service automation platform targeting B2B clients
objectives: Validate product-market fit with initial customers
success_criteria: Functional chat interface with AI responses
Integration with at least 2 knowledge base systems

phases.name: Project Initiation & Planning
phases.description: Set up project foundation, requirements gathering, and technical planning

tasks.name: Project Setup & Team Onboarding
tasks.description: Initialize project structure, set up development environment, and onboard team members

tasks.name: Requirements Gathering & Analysis
tasks.description: Detailed analysis of customer needs, technical requirements, and feature specifications

tasks.name: System Architecture Design
tasks.description: Design overall system architecture, technology stack selection, and integration patterns

tasks.name: UI/UX Design & Prototyping
tasks.description: Create user interface designs, wireframes, and interactive prototypes

phases.name: Core Development
phases.description: Development of core AI chat functionality and backend systems

tasks.name: Backend API Development
tasks.description: Build core backend APIs, authentication, and data models

tasks.name: AI Chat Engine Integration
tasks.description: Integrate AI/ML models for natural language processing and response generation

tasks.name: Knowledge Base Integration
tasks.description: Develop connectors for popular knowledge base systems (Confluence, Notion, etc.)

tasks.name: Frontend Chat Interface
tasks.description: Build responsive chat interface with real-time messaging capabilities

phases.name: Analytics & Dashboard
phases.description: Development of analytics dashboard and reporting capabilities

tasks.name: Analytics Backend
tasks.description: Build analytics data collection, processing, and storage systems

tasks.name: Dashboard Frontend
tasks.description: Create interactive dashboard with charts, metrics, and reporting features

tasks.name: Reporting System
tasks.description: Implement automated reporting and alerting capabilities

phases.name: Testing & Quality Assurance
phases.description: Comprehensive testing, bug fixing, and quality assurance

tasks.name: Unit & Integration Testing
tasks.description: Develop and execute comprehensive test suites for all components

tasks.name: User Acceptance Testing
tasks.description: Conduct UAT with internal stakeholders and beta customers

tasks.name: Performance Testing
tasks.description: Load testing, performance optimization, and scalability validation

tasks.name: Security Testing
tasks.description: Security assessment, vulnerability testing, and compliance validation

phases.name: Deployment & Launch
phases.description: Production deployment, monitoring setup, and go-live activities

tasks.name: Production Environment Setup
tasks.description: Configure production infrastructure, monitoring, and deployment pipelines

tasks.name: Data Migration & Setup
tasks.description: Migrate initial data, configure integrations, and set up customer accounts

tasks.name: Go-Live & Launch Support
tasks.description: Execute go-live plan, provide launch support, and monitor initial usage

risks.name: AI Model Performance Issues
risks.description: AI chat responses may not meet quality expectations, requiring model fine-tuning or alternative approaches
risks.mitigation_strategy: Conduct early AI model testing, have backup models ready, allocate time for fine-tuning
risks.contingency_plan: Switch to rule-based system initially, gradually introduce AI capabilities

risks.name: Knowledge Base Integration Complexity
risks.description: Third-party KB integrations may be more complex than anticipated, causing delays
risks.mitigation_strategy: Start with one KB integration, research APIs thoroughly, contact vendors early
risks.contingency_plan: Focus on most important integration, defer secondary ones to post-MVP

risks.name: Resource Availability
risks.description: Key team members may become unavailable due to other commitments or illness
risks.mitigation_strategy: Cross-train team members, maintain documentation, have backup resources identified
risks.contingency_plan: Bring in contractors or consultants, reduce scope if necessary

risks.name: Scope Creep
risks.description: Stakeholders may request additional features beyond MVP scope
risks.mitigation_strategy: Clear scope documentation, regular stakeholder communication, change control process
risks.contingency_plan: Defer additional features to Phase 2, maintain MVP focus

risks.name: Security Vulnerabilities
risks.description: Security issues may be discovered late in development, requiring significant rework
risks.mitigation_strategy: Security review in each phase, follow security best practices, early penetration testing
risks.contingency_plan: Allocate emergency security sprint, delay launch if critical issues found

risks.name: Performance Scaling Issues
risks.description: System may not perform well under load, requiring architecture changes
risks.mitigation_strategy: Early performance testing, scalable architecture design, load testing
risks.contingency_plan: Optimize critical paths, consider caching solutions, scale infrastructure

milestones.name: Project Kickoff Complete
milestones.description: All planning and setup activities completed, team ready to start development

milestones.name: Core Backend Complete
milestones.description: Backend APIs and AI integration functional

milestones.name: Frontend & Analytics Complete
milestones.description: Chat interface and analytics dashboard ready

milestones.name: Testing Complete
milestones.description: All testing phases completed and issues resolved

milestones.name: MVP Launch
milestones.description: Production deployment complete and MVP launched

rag_citations.content: Three-Point Estimation methodology for accurate project timeline planning
Agile development practices for MVP delivery and iterative improvement
Best practices for integrating AI/ML models in production systems

documentation.report:
# AI Customer Service MVP - Project Plan

## Executive Summary
This project delivers an AI-powered customer service automation platform MVP within 3 months...
documentation.slides:
## Slide 1: Project Overview
- **Goal**: Launch AI Customer Service MVP
- **Timeline**: 3 months
- **Budget**: $425,000
- **Team**: 5+ specialists
documentation.executive_summary: Strategic initiative to develop and launch an AI-powered customer service automation platform targeting B2B market with 85-day delivery timeline and $425k budget.
